title: Update project version to 0.2.0 for public release
description:
**As a** project maintainer
**I want** to update the version number to 0.2.0
**So that** the first public release has a meaningful version number

**Context:**
Current version is 0.1.0 (Alpha). The project is now ready for public release with:
- Complete TUI with conversation history
- Full CLI command suite (ask, chat, history, config)
- Multi-provider AI support (OpenAI, Anthropic, Google, Ollama)
- Tool calling system with file operations, code search, image analysis
- Comprehensive documentation
- 70+ completed tickets across 7 epics

Version 0.2.0 signifies:
- Still pre-1.0 (not production-ready/stable API)
- Significant progress from 0.1.0
- First public-facing release
- Beta quality software

**Technical Notes:**
- File: `pyproject.toml` lines 7, 121
- Current: `version = "0.1.0"`
- Target: `version = "0.2.0"`
- Also update src/consoul/__init__.py if __version__ exists
- Check for version in any other files (setup.py, conf.py, etc.)

**Acceptance Criteria:**

**Given** I run `poetry version`
**When** the command completes
**Then** it shows version 0.2.0

**Given** I import consoul in Python
**When** I check `consoul.__version__`
**Then** it returns "0.2.0"

**Given** I run `consoul --version`
**When** the command completes
**Then** it displays "consoul version 0.2.0"

**Testing Considerations:**
- Verify version in PKG-INFO after `poetry build`
- Check version appears correctly in PyPI metadata
- Ensure no hardcoded "0.1.0" strings remain
- Test --version flag if it exists

**Implementation Hints:**
- Update pyproject.toml line 7 AND line 121 (both [project] and [tool.poetry] sections)
- Search codebase for "0.1.0" to find any hardcoded references
- Use: `poetry version 0.2.0` to update automatically
- Verify with: `grep -r "0.1.0" . --include="*.py" --include="*.toml"`

comments.author: jared@goatbytes.io
comments.content:
Successfully updated version to 0.2.0 in all locations:
- pyproject.toml [project] section
- pyproject.toml [tool.poetry] section  
- src/consoul/__init__.py

Verified with Python import - version displays correctly as 0.2.0.
All tests and pre-commit hooks passed.
